page.title: 09EDUCATION IN THE l980's
page.content: School in the l980's ran from Monday to Friday. You would have to be there for 9.00 a.m. and leave at 3.30 p.m. I am writing about Brunswick Middle School which is a school in the village of Woodhouse and has a capacity of around 240 children. In the mornings we learn mathematics and English. At twelve o'clock we have our dinner. At one o'clock we start lessons again such as science, environmental studies, religious education and we have a spelling test every Friday. We also have physical education which is exercises and we play games such as rounders and netball. We have a break after mathematics, at dinner time and during the afternoon.
